items.title: Wall Street doubles US recession risk as Trump tariffs loom
items.description: US stocks have plummeted as Wall Street doubled its predictions of a recession in America in the wake of Donald Trump’s trade war.

items.title: Apple rolls out Priority Notifications as Apple Intelligence expands to EU
items.description: Apple Intelligence, the iPhone maker's suite of AI-powered tools and features, is gaining new features. Most notably, the company on Monday announced that Apple device owners will now be able to take advantage of Priority Notifications, which allows Apple's AI to highlight your most time-sensitive notifications in a new format. Other updates are coming to the Image Playground app and the Mac. Plus, Apple Intelligence is now available to iPhone and iPad users in the EU and on the Apple Vision Pro
